bike.description: NEW Fuji Altair 2 custom butted aluminum with PoweCurve down tube, Tri shaped top tube, Oversized seat tube and Integrated head tube, double water bottle mounts

components.description: Fuji Altair 2, custom butted aluminum with Edge S-bend MonoStay, Cold forged dropout with CNC D disc mount and replaceable hanger
Rock Shox Reba 29 SL Air, 80mm Travel w/Remote PopLoc
Wellgo ATB w/steel cage, toe clips and straps
WTB  Lazer Disc Trail 29", 32H DW w/ Single Eyelet
Avid Elixir R Hydraulic Disc, 160R/185F mm rotor
V.P. A-42E 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Fuji CGC Riser 15mm double butted aluminum 31.8mm
Fuji CGC Ultalite Forged Alloy +/- 7 degree
Fuji CGC Forged Al micro adjust, 350mm
Fuji Superlite Alloy QR, 34.9mm Laser Etched
